title: "Co2 & Temp comparison"
author: "Shivangi Nadkar"
date: "2022-11-11"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Co2data<- read_xlsx(path = "2022_HiMCM_Data.xlsx", sheet = 1)
Tempdata<- read_xlsx(path = "2022_HiMCM_Data.xlsx", sheet = 2)
```

```{r}

tempplot<- Tempdata|>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Year, y = `Degrees C`)) +
  geom_line()


Co2data|>
  ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = PPM)) +
  geom_line() +autolayer(tempplot)

```
